name: Captain Jacks Treasure
description:
Gameplay

Jack is obsessed by his riches. When jack went for a strawl he lost some of his treasures, help him collect it and get him home safely.

To help Jack get his treasures back, you can jump and change his direction. The faster you get done, and the more treasures you've gotten back the better score you'll get.

Features
  • Highscore will help you keep track of how you're doing.
  • Use double-jump to your advantage.
  • Speed-buf to help you get done faster.
How to play?

Use left and right arrow keys to change direction, to gain a speed buf press the arrow key in your current direction.

In order to jump you press arrow key up, should you want to double jump just press arrow key up again whilst in the air.

Credits

All assets used is made by myself, except for the soundtrack.  The soundtrack used in this game is  A night of dizzy spells by Eric Skiff and is licensed as CC BY-SA 3.0.
